org.androidtown.sleeper.propclasses.com_manager

Class clDeviceMessageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.androidtown.sleeper.propclasses.com_manager.clDeviceMessageConverter

  • public abstract class clDeviceMessageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Device message is sent to remote device encapsulated inside request or response message. This class is inherited by each device-specific message that is understandable for each device that is connected to ap device. Ap device processes wifi message and parse this device specific message area from received message. Then device message object will dissolve message with their own dissolving method. We assume that there will be more than one device connected to controlling device, so connected devices have to be identified so that no duplicate device message can trigger several device to respond.
